ethereumsection.h3: Post tweets to add social kontext to websites
ethereumsection.p: Link TL;DRs ELI5s from Twitter, Reddit, Telegram to relevant sites like ethereum.org. This way, we won't lose useful content, while retaining context of the original poster.

ethereumsection.h3: Improve Open Source projects with your feedback
ethereumsection.p: Lower the hurdle to give feedback on projects. Any Metamask user can leave a simple note. And product teams can ask for feedback on their website, targeting only Kontext users.

ethereumsection.h3: Mark malicious addresses for reputation tokens
ethereumsection.p: Trust score. Security ratings. Project ratings. Crowdsource a database of malicious actors and good community members. Look up your friends favorite projects and help Metamask to keep their phishing database up to date.

Instead of anonymous fake reviews, see which restaurants your friends like. Visiting a new city? Look up your friend's friends recommendations. Scrolling through Netflix, not sure what to watch next? Kontext recommends you a 5-star movie from your social network.

ethereumsection.h3: A subjective spam and fake news filter
ethereumsection.p: Don't want anyone to be able to get your attention? Close your mail access to people in your web-of-trust â€” friends, colleagues and their friends. Tired of fake news? Know another source, which says the opposite? Post it to the news article and get rewarded
Follow lists like "darkmode anywhere" to get your favorite websites in darkmode. Crowdsource the edited css code with other Kontext users and get rewarded for sharing your code.

beyondsection.p: Exchange p2p recommendations: videos, music, restaurants, longread, movie. Add and receive content similar to the one you currently view.
Personalize websites. Follow lists like "darkmode anywhere" and edit the css of your favorite website.

beyondsection.h3: A subjective spam and fake news filter
beyondsection.p: Know another source, which says the opposite? Post it and get rewarded
Better data for brave ads. Allow anyone to put ads anywhere and match them with viewers. Users price the viewing time. Allowing for variable pricing.
